Literature.Title: An Amphipathic Undecapeptide With All d-Amino Acids Shows Promising Activity Against Colistin-Resistant Strains of Acinetobacter Baumannii and a Dual Mode of Action
Literature.Author: Oddo A, Thomsen TT, Kjelstrup S, Franzyk H, Frimodt-Møller N, Løbner-Olesen A, Hansen PR

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=>269µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 700221(MIC=269µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=134µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=134µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=269µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-1605(MIC=134µg/ml)
